thread.title: WATCH: Robert Martin runs for touchdown to give Rutgers early lead
thread.title_full: WATCH: Robert Martin runs for touchdown to give Rutgers early lead

author: Keith Sargeant | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: Robert Martin runs for touchdown to give Rutgers early lead
text:
Comments 
BLOOMINGTON, Ind. â€” There's something about Indiana that brings out the best in Robert Martin. 
The Rutgers sophomore running back, who ran for three touchdowns in a win over the Hoosiers last season, scored the first time he ran the ball Saturday against Indiana. 
The 6-0, 205-pounder took a handoff from quarterback Chris Laviano and broke through the line, cutting left and racing in untouched to help give the Scarlet Knights a 7-3 lead 10 minutes into the game. Robert Martin gets @RFootball on the board with this 24-YD TD run. Brought to you by @hotelsdotcom . http://t.co/CAkM3b2PAt
